    • createJettyDump

      public Ok createJettyDump​(RestRequest req, RestResponse res) throws java.lang.Exception
      [POST /jetty/dump] - Generates and saves the jetty thread dump file to jetty-thread-dump.log.
      Parameters:
      req - The request.
      res - The response.
      Returns:
      The thread dump contents.
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - Gets converted to 500 response.
